analyzed: ārya buddha bala ādhāna prātihārya vikurvāṇa nirdeśa nāma mahāyāna sūtram
evam mayā śrutam

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadīnairañjanātīre sanniṣaṇṇaḥ sārdhamāryāvalokiteśvara
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadī nairañjanā tīre sanniṣaṇṇaḥ sārdham ārya avalokiteśvara
vajrapāṇi maitreya mañjuśrī pūrvaṅgamaiḥ sapta bodhisattva sahasraiḥ sārdham subhūti
śāriputra maudgalyāyana purvaṅgamaiḥ sarveḥ mahāśrāvakaiḥ śakra brahma lokapāla rāja amātya brāhmaṇa gṛhapatibhiḥ
sarvaiḥ satkṛtaḥ mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ

original: bhagavān bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalamālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇo dharmapratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati sañcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati
analyzed: bhagavān bhakta kṛtyam kṛtvā maṇḍala mālāyām sanniṣaṇṇaḥ dharma pratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati sañcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati

original: maṇḍalamālāyāstathāgato maharddhinagarīṃ vārāṇasīṃ gatvā tasyāmāmrapālīvane niṣīdati sma /
analyzed: maṇḍalamālāyāḥ tathāgataḥ mahā ṛddhi nagarīm vārāṇasīm gatvā tasyām āmrapālī vane niṣīdati sma

original: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivī saṅkampitā sampravedhitā /
analyzed: atha tasmin samaye mahā pṛthivī saṅkampitā sampravedhitā

original: sthitaṃ tatra mahāsiṃhāsanamekaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ saptakarmakṛtaṃ yojanamātramuccamardhayojanamātravistṛtaṃ
analyzed: sthitam tatra mahā siṃhāsanam ekam nānā ratna mayam sapta karma kṛtam yojana mātram uccam ardha yojana mātra vistṛtam
sukha citam ati harṣaṇīyam manojñam divya bhakta saṃstṛtam nānā divya puṣpa phala pralambitam
divya gandha varṇa yuktam
tathāgatānām avaropita kuśala mūlam avalokya sarva sattvānām anutpatti dharma kṣānti pratilambhaḥ bhūt

original: atha bhagavān siṃhāsanasthito buddhāvataṃsakanāma samādhiṃ pratileme /
analyzed: atha bhagavān siṃhāsana sthitaḥ buddha avataṃsaka nāma samādhim pratileme
atha samādheḥ vyutthāya bodhisattva ārya avalokiteśvaram vajrapāṇim ca idam avocat

original: avalokiteśvara tvaṃ mahālokadhātuṃ gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineyasattvānāṃ
analyzed: avalokiteśvara tvam mahā lokadhātum gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineya sattvānām

original: kaṣāyayuktānām aśrāddhānāṃ pāpacaritānāṃ kleśāvṛtānām amātṛjñānāmapitṛjñānām aśrāmaṇyānām
analyzed: kaṣāya yuktānām aśrāddhānām pāpa caritānām kleśa āvṛtānām a mātṛ jñānām a pitṛ jñānām a śrāmaṇyānām

original: abrāhmaṇyānāṃ triratnānabhiśrāddhānāṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ ca vajrapāṇiśca dvau maharddhiṃ
analyzed: a brāhmaṇyānām triratna an abhiśrāddhānām teṣām sarveṣām tvam ca vajrapāṇiḥ ca dvau maharddhim

original: samādhibalaṃ pratipadya asyāṃ maṇḍalamālāyāmabhisaṅkṣipya saṅgrahaṃ kurutam /
analyzed: samādhi balam pratipadya asyām maṇḍala mālāyām abhisaṅkṣipya saṅgraham kurutam

original: athāryāvalokiteśvaro vajrapāṇiśca tathāgatasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānavalokya samuttejanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
analyzed: atha ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ ca tathāgatasya vacanam śrutvā sarva sattvān avalokya samuttejanam nāma samādhim samāpede

original: tena samādhibalena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā /
analyzed: tena samādhi balena mahā pṛthivī ṣaṣ vikāram kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā

original: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau brahmalokadhātau yāvad rūpalokadhātau tayoḥ kāyāvabhāsaprādurbhāvo 'bhūt /
analyzed: tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātau brahma lokadhātau yāvat rūpa lokadhātau tayoḥ kāya avabhāsa prādurbhāvaḥ bhūt

original: atha tadavabhāsata imāḥ sañcodanā gāthā niścaranti sma /
analyzed: atha tad avabhāsataḥ imāḥ sañcodanāḥ gāthāḥ niścaranti sma

original: atha tadā kāyāvabhāsaniścaritagāthāvasāne ekaikaṃ pāramparyeṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvā vijñāpitāḥ samuttejivāḥ /
analyzed: atha tadā kāya avabhāsa niścarita gāthā avasāne ekaikam pāramparyeṇa tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvāḥ vijñāpitāḥ samuttejivāḥ

original: te sarve sattvā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ parityajya samyagadṛṣṭiyuktā abhūvan /
analyzed: te sarve sattvāḥ mithyādṛṣṭim parityajya samyak adṛṣṭi yuktāḥ abhūvan
ye māna mada stambha yuktāḥ te māna mada stambha viyuktāḥ abhūvan

original: ye kāmarāgānucaritāḥ pramattāste prāṇātipātādattādānakāmeṣu mithyācārādyaṣṭākuśaladharmebhyo nivṛttāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge sthāpitāḥ /
analyzed: ye kāma rāga anucaritāḥ pramattāḥ te prāṇa atipāta a datta ādāna kāmeṣu mithyā ācāra ādi aṣṭa akuśala dharmebhyaḥ nivṛttāḥ ārya aṣṭāṅgika mārge sthāpitāḥ
sarve te auddhatya hāsya lāsya krīḍā lobha krodha īrṣyā rāga ādi sarvam parityajya tathāgata darśana sevana paryupāsana dharma śravaṇa kāmāḥ abhūvan
deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura kinnara garuḍa mahoraga rāja amātya bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikābhiḥ sarve divya puṣpa mālya gandha cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā ādibhiḥ
tathāgataḥ pūjitaḥ

original: atha sarve te yena mahānagaryayāṃ vārāṇasyām āmrapālīvanaṃ tenopasaṅkramya tathāgatānāmavaropitakuśalamūlapuṇyatejasā tathāgatasyopari puṣpavargamabhiprāvarṣan
analyzed: atha sarve te yena mahā nagaryayām vārāṇasyām āmrapālī vanam tena upasaṅkramya tathāgatānām avaropita kuśala mūla puṇya tejasā tathāgatasya upari puṣpa vargam abhiprāvarṣan

original: atha tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālīvanaṃ samantataḥ niyutaśatasahasrayojanavistīrṇamadhyatiṣṭhat (BuBal 177.18)
analyzed: atha tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālī vanam samantataḥ niyuta śata sahasra yojana vistīrṇam adhyatiṣṭhat bubal

original: samaṃ pāṇitalamiva ca divyaṃ manoramaṃ varṇopetam /
analyzed: samam pāṇi talam iva ca divyam manoramam varṇa upetam
divya puṣpa vṛkṣa gandha vṛkṣa phala vṛkṣa mahā ratna vṛkṣa kalpavṛkṣa vastra vṛkṣa ādibhiḥ alaṅkatam
divya saṃhāsana upetam ratna paṭṭāt ādāma abhiprabham pītam divya kiṅkiṇī dāma śabda upaśobhitam
tat yathā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ
tathā manojñam prahlādanīyam premaṇīyam abhinandanīyam
sarva bodhisattva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga upāsaka upāsikā rāja amātya brāhmaṇa gṛhapati ākīrṇam adhyatiṣṭhat

original: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiśca samādhervyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
analyzed: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ vajrapāṇiḥ ca samādheḥ vyutthāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ
upasaṅkramya tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantam etat avocat
asti bhagavan tathāgatānām upāya kauśalyam sattva paripākāya
bahavaḥ bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ mahāśrāvakāḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga rāja amātya gṛhapatayaḥ
bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ sannipatitāḥ tathāgata tejasā ṛddhi anubhāvena
sādhu sādhu kula putrāḥ

original: evameva bahavo bho jinaputrāstathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ sattvaparipākāya yathāśayānāṃ yathā vainayikakuśalamūlādhigatānāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ  #
analyzed: evam eva bahavaḥ bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānām upāya kauśalyam sattva paripākāya yathā āśayānām yathā vainayika kuśala mūla adhigatānām nānā adhimuktānām sattvānām
carim jñātvā dharmam deśayanti

original: kecit sattvā bodhisattvavaineyāḥ kecicchrāvakavaineyāḥ kecit pratyekabuddhavaineyāḥ
analyzed: kecid sattvāḥ bodhisattva vaineyāḥ kecid śrāvaka vaineyāḥ kecid pratyekabuddha vaineyāḥ

original: kecid devavaineyāḥ kecit śakravaineyāḥ kecid brahmavaineyāḥ kecinnāgavaineyāḥ kecinmahardhikavaineyāḥ
analyzed: kecid deva vaineyāḥ kecid śakra vaineyāḥ kecid brahma vaineyāḥ kecid nāga vaineyāḥ kecid mahardhika vaineyāḥ

original: kecidrājavaineyāḥ kecit samādhivaineyāḥ kecid dharmaśravaṇavaineyāḥ kecit prātihāryavaineyāḥ
analyzed: kecid rāja vaineyāḥ kecid samādhi vaineyāḥ kecid dharma śravaṇa vaineyāḥ kecid prātihārya vaineyāḥ
kecid tathāgata parinirvāṇa vaineyāḥ kecid dhātu vaineyāḥ kecid caitya karaṇa praveśa vihāra caṅkrama udyāna kārāpaṇa kuśala mūla vaineya utsukāḥ
kecid prastara pratibimba kārāpaṇa ālekhya suvarṇa rajata raitya pratibimba kārāpaṇa kuśala mūla utasuka vaineyāḥ
kecid bhikṣu saṅgha pūjana satkaraṇa kuśala mūla utsuka vaineyāḥ kecid
sūtra pṛcchana likhana paṭhana pūjana ud suka vaineyāḥ kecid dīpa puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya āhāra abhyalaṅkaraṇa utsukāḥ bhavanti
na parama artha kuśala mūla dharma upetāḥ na nirvāṇa dharma upetāḥ

original: dharmāṇāmapi ca bho jinaputrā nāsti tathāgatānāṃ kiñcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā /
analyzed: dharmāṇām api ca bho jinaputrāḥ na asti tathāgatānām kiñcid ajñātam vā adṛṣṭam vā aśrutam vā aviditam vā
āgatam vā jānāti
anāgatam vā jānāti
alpam vā jānāti
bahum vā jānāti
atītam jānāti

utpādam jānāti
upapattim jānāti

original: tadyathā bho jinaputrā vaidyaḥ suśikṣitaḥ sarvāṣṭāṅgāyurvedamupagataḥ sarvadhātukauśalyasarvadravyopakaraṇaprayogābhiyuktaḥ sattvānāṃ nānāvyādhiśarīraparipīḍitānāṃ  #
analyzed: tat yathā bho jinaputrāḥ vaidyaḥ su śikṣitaḥ sarva aṣṭāṅga āyurvedam upagataḥ sarva dhātu kauśalya sarva dravya upakaraṇa prayoga abhiyuktaḥ sattvānām nānā vyādhi śarīra paripīḍitānām
dhātum jānāti
balam jānāti
velam jānāti
auṣadham jānāti

original: rudhiram āmajaṃ gulmikaṃ jalodaraṃ hṛdarogaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kaṇḍūṃ dadruṃ piṭakādīn viṣavaisarpādīn jānāti /
analyzed: rudhiram āma jam gulmikam jalodaram hṛd arogam kuṣṭham kaṇḍūm dadrum piṭaka ādīn viṣa vaisarpa ādīn jānāti

original: sa sarvaṃ jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravyauṣadhāni prayojya vamanavirecanacūrṇayoganastukarmasīrābandhanadhṛtatailabālacūrṇayogena
analyzed: sa sarvam jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravya auṣadhāni prayojya vamana virecana cūrṇa yoga nastu karma sīrābandhana dhṛta taila bāla cūrṇa yogena
pācana vanam aprayoga upāyaiḥ sarva sattvānām tān sava vyādhīn upaśamayati
nānā vyādhitaḥ parimokṣyante nānā vyādhi bhayebhyaḥ ca
evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ nānā samādhi ṛddhipāda bala vaiśāradya divya cakṣuḥ śrotra ādibhiḥ aṣṭāṅga āyurveda samanvāgataḥ
nānā dhātu āśaya prayoga kuśalaḥ rāga dveṣa moha vyādhi kleśa upakleśa vyādhi pīḍītānām bu bal
sattvānām māna mada matta tā vṛtānām kāma śoka bhaya krodha āvṛtānām naraka tiryagyoni yama loka bhūmi parimokṣaṇa artham
nānā upāya kauśalyaiḥ nānā prakāra yogaiḥ nānā samādhi ṛddhi vikrīḍitaiḥ sattvān parimocayati
yāvat anuttarāyām samyakambodhau pratiṣṭhāpya an upadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvāpayati
akuśalaiḥ dhamaiḥ parimokṣyate
ārya aṣṭāṅge mārge pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: tadyathāpi kulaputrāḥ candramaṇḍalamupāyākauśalya samanvāgataṃ yathādhātukuśalamūlavaineyān sattvānāmarthāya ātmānamantarhitaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: tat yathā api kula putrāḥ candra maṇḍalam upāya a kauśalya samanvāgatam yathā dhātu kuśala mūla vaineyān sattvānām arthāya ātmānam antarhitam darśayati
ardhacandra ākṛti maṇḍalam upadarśayati

sarva tamaḥ ndhakāram vidhamayati
sarva tṛṇa vana gulma oṣadhi phala ādīn prahlādayati

original: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ nānāduḥkhāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātuvaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ mārgacaryākauśalyaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānām nānā duḥkha āvṛtānām sattvānām nānā dhātu vaineyānām sattvānām mārga caryā kauśalyam parinirvāṇam darśayati
jātim darśayati
cakravarti rājyam darśayati
krīḍā rati strī hāsya lāsya gandha mālya rati krīḍām darśayati
gṛha tyāga pravrajyā duṣkara caryām darśayati
māra bala damana dharma cakra pravartanam darśayati
yāvat mahā dharma megha vṛṣṭayā sarva sattvānām santoṣaṇam upadarśayati
parinirvṛtāḥ api tathāgatāḥ nānā prayoga dhātu pūjana stūpa vihāra pratibimba kārāpaṇa pravrajyā abhiniṣkramaṇa bhikṣu saṅgha satkāra vinaya dharma likhana vācana paṭhanāt eva
sarva sattvān mokṣayanti
śikṣā dhāraṇa vrata niyama upavāsa saṃvara grahaṇa upāya kuśalaiḥ sarva sattvān mokṣayanti
sarva naraka tiryagyoni yama loka akṣaṇa apāya durgatibhyaḥ yāvat prahlādayanti
dharma śravaṇena anuttarāyām samyaksambodhau sthāpayanti

original: atha tasmin samaye keṣāñcidalpabuddhīnāṃ devaputrāṇām etadabhavat /
analyzed: atha tasmin samaye keṣāñcid alpabuddhīnām deva putrāṇām etat abhavat

original: kimayaṃ tathāgataḥ kṣiprameva parinirvāṇadhātau praveṣṭumicchatīti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan /
analyzed: kim ayam tathāgataḥ kṣipram eva parinirvāṇa dhātau praveṣṭum icchati iti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan
parinirvāṇam varṇayati sūcayati
mahā parṣad sannipātya nānā ṛddhi vikurvāṇa prātihāryam darśayati
tat yathā pūrvakaiḥ
tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ tathāgata kṛtyam kṛtam dīrghataram āyuḥ adhiṣṭhāya
sarva sattvān jāti jarā vyādhi cyuti śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsebhyaḥ parimokṣya

original: tathāyamanena tathāgatena sarve tathāgatakṛtyaṃ nādyāpi kṛtam /
analyzed: tathā ayam anena tathāgatena sarve tathāgata kṛtyam na adya api kṛtam

original: tasmāt śokavyatikramaṇaṃ saṃvarṇayatīti cintayitvā te tūṣṇīmabhūvan /
analyzed: tasmāt śoka vyatikramaṇam saṃvarṇayati iti cintayitvā te tūṣṇīm abhūvan

original: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtasteṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cittamājñāya tān devaputrānetadavocat /
analyzed: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ teṣām deva putrāṇām cetasā eva cittam ājñāya tān deva putrān etat avocat

original: devaputrā mā evaṃ cintayata mā pravyāharata /
analyzed: deva putrāḥ mā evam cintayata mā pravyāharata
mā dina manasaḥ bhavata
bahūni tathāgatānām upāya kuśala nānā upāya prajñā samādhi ādi kuśala mūla bala praṇidhānāni nānā āśayānām sattvānām dharmam deśayanti

original: yathā mayā devaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatopāyakauśalyam ṛddhivikurvāṇaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāhaṃ jānāmi /
analyzed: yathā mayā deva putrāḥ tathāgatānām pūrvakāṇām tathāgata upāya kauśalyam ṛddhi vikurvāṇa prātihāryam dṛṣṭam tathā aham jānāmi

original: mā hi eva tathāgato buddhabalādhānaprātihāryaṃ nāma mahāsūtrarājaṃ prakāśayitukāmo 'tireka kartukāmaḥ /
analyzed: mā hi eva tathāgataḥ buddha bala ādhāna prātihāryam nāma mahā sūtra rājam prakāśayitu kāmaḥ tireka kartu kāmaḥ

original: api ca devaputrā na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
analyzed: api ca deva putrāḥ na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti
na tathāgatānām parinirvāṇam saṃvidyate
na āyuḥ kṣayaḥ bhavati
aprameya kalpa koṭīm anabhilāpya akalpāḥ tathāgatāḥ tiṣṭhanti

original: api ca upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayanti /
analyzed: api ca upāya kauśalyena sattvānām parinirvāṇam darśayanti
na ca ākrāntiḥ na saṅkrāntiḥ tathāgatānām saṃvidyate
saddharma antardhānam darśayanti

original: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇavaineyaḥ dhātuvaineyaḥ kaṣāyikajātīyaḥ tathāgate
analyzed: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇa vaineyaḥ dhātu vaineyaḥ kaṣāyika jātīyaḥ tathāgate

original: aśraddadhānatām aguruśuśrūṣitāṃ gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati
analyzed: a śraddadhāna tām a guru śuśrūṣi tām gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇam darśayati
na ca ākrāntiḥ na saṅkrāntiḥ tathāgatānām saṃvidyate
sarva sattvāḥ paripakva kuśala mūlāḥ bhavanti
tathāgate darśana abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ pūjā arhāḥ dharma śravaṇa āthikāḥ

original: candramaṇḍalaṃ yathā rocate tathā tadā tathāgatā loka utpadyante bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya /
analyzed: candra maṇḍalam yathā rocate tathā tadā tathāgatāḥ loke utpadyante bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya

original: yāvaddevānāṃ ca munuṣyāṇāṃ ca triratnoddayotanāya sphuṭanāya na ca tathāgatānāṃ jātiḥ saṃvidyate /
analyzed: yāvat devānām ca munuṣyāṇām ca tri ratna uddayotanāya sphuṭanāya na ca tathāgatānām jātiḥ saṃvidyate

original: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ ādarśamaṇḍale sumṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante dṛśyaṃ na
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kula putrāḥ ādarśa maṇḍale su mṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante dṛśyam na

original: saṃvidyate na tatrāgamo dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya evameva devaputrāḥ tathāgatakāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: saṃvidyate na tatra āgamaḥ dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya evam eva devaputrāḥ tathāgata kāyaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrā māyakāraḥsuśikṣitaḥ nānānagaratoraṇodyānāṃ nānārathāṃ
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kula putrāḥ māyaka araḥ su śikṣitaḥ nānā nagara toraṇa udyānām nānā rathām

original: cakravartirūpāṃ nānāratikrīḍāṃ darśayitvā antardhāpayati na ca tasyāḥ krāntirdṛśyate
analyzed: cakravarti rūpām nānā rati krīḍām darśayitvā antardhāpayati na ca tasyāḥ krāntiḥ dṛśyate

original: na āgamo na nirgamaḥ evameva tathāgatānāmutapādaparinirvāṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: na āgamaḥ na nirgamaḥ evam eva tathāgatānām uta pāda parinirvāṇam draṣṭavyam

original: api ca devaputrāḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā api kalpaparinirvṛtā api
analyzed: api ca deva putrāḥ pūrva praṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtāḥ api kalpa parinirvṛtāḥ api
kalpa koṭī parinirvṛtāḥ api sattvānām pūjana satkaraṇa dhātu stūpa kārāpaṇa pratibimba kārāpaṇa nāmadheya grahaṇa saddharma dhāraṇa pūjanāḥ

original: nānālokadhātuvyavasthitā api mokṣayanti sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇadurgativinipātebhyaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ yāvadanupūrveṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhyate
analyzed: nānā lokadhātu vyavasthitāḥ api mokṣayanti sarva naraka tiryagyoni yama loka akṣaṇa durgati vinipātebhyaḥ sarva duḥkhebhyaḥ yāvat anupūrveṇa anuttarām samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate

original: kaḥ punarvādo ye tathāgatān pratyakṣapūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandhapuṣpamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ ye tathāgatān pratyakṣa pūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandha puṣpa mālya vilepana vastra ābharaṇaiḥ

original: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecit sattvā varṣaśatasahasrakalpakoṭīparinirvṛtān prāñjalibhūtān
analyzed: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecid sattvāḥ varṣa śata sahasra kalpa koṭī parinirvṛtān prāñjali bhūtān

original: ekavārān nāmadheyaṃ grahīṣyanti 'namo buddhāyeti ' kṛtvā puṣpamākāśe kṣepasyanti
analyzed: eka vārāt nāmadheyam grahīṣyanti namaḥ buddhāya iti kṛtvā puṣpam ākāśe kṣepasyanti
te sarve duḥkhasya antam kariṣyanti

original: tiṣṭhatvākāśe puṣpaṃ ye kecit sattvāḥ anuśikṣamāṇāstathāgatapūjārthāya ekatathāgataśikṣāmapi
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ākāśe puṣpam ye kecid sattvāḥ anuśikṣamāṇāḥ tathāgata pūjā arthāya eka tathāgata śikṣām api
dhārayiṣyanti eka divasam eka rātri muhūrtam tathāgata pūjana cintā abhiyuktāḥ sarva duḥkhasya antam
kṛtvā anupūrveṇa anuttarām samyaksambodhim abhisambodhiṣyanti

original: ye ca tathāgatapūjāyāṃ diśyasikanāma....vāpi hāsyalāsyabālaratikrīḍanakameva kārayiṣyanti
analyzed: ye ca tathāgata pūjāyām hāsya lāsya bāla rati krīḍanakam eva kārayiṣyanti

original: sarve te duḥkhasyāntaṃ kṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhiṣyanti kaḥ punarvādo
analyzed: sarve te duḥkhasya antam kṛtvā anuttarām samyaksambodhim abhisambodhiṣyanti kaḥ punar vādaḥ

original: ye dhātustūpaṃ dhātupratimāṃ vā kṛtvā sarvasattvadayāparajñāḥ 'sarvasattvān duḥkhebhyaḥ
analyzed: ye dhātu stūpam dhātu pratimām vā kṛtvā sarva sattva dayā para jñāḥ sarva sattvān duḥkhebhyaḥ
parimocayiṣyāmi iti anuttarāyām samyaksambodhau cittam utpādya divya puṣpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa tūrya chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ
pūjayiṣyanti darśayiṣyanti te jāti jarā maraṇa duḥkha upāyāsebhyaḥ parimokṣyante
